name: Iron Bar
desc: Iron bar is a crafting material used to create weapons and armor.

name: Silver Ore
desc: Silver ore can be smelt to create Silver Ornaments, or grinded into fine silver dust used in Enchanting.

name: Cured Leather
desc: Cured leather is a crafting material used to create weapons and armor.

name: Bolt of Silk Cloth
desc: Bolt of Silk Cloth is a crafting material used to create weapons and armor.

name: Mark of Titans
desc: The Mark of Titans is a rare reagent used in crafting to create Set and Unique armor and weapons.

name: Enchanted Leather
desc: Enchanted leather is an exotic crafting material used to create Set and Unique armor and weapons.

name: Silver Ornament
desc: Silver Ornament is a crafting material used to create weapons and armor.

name: Mithril
desc: Mithril is an exotic crafting material used to create Set and Unique armor and weapons.

name: Nightcloth
desc: Nightcloth is an exotic crafting material used to create Set and Unique armor.

name: Silver Dust
desc: Silver Dust is a crafting material used to create enchantments.

name: Haunting Spirit
desc: Haunting Spirit is a crafting material used to create enchantments.

name: Spirit of War
desc: Spirit of War is a crafting material used to create enchantments.

name: Primal Spirit
desc: Primal Spirit is a crafting material used to create enchantments.

name: Living Spirit
desc: Living Spirit is a crafting material used to create enchantments.

name: Spirit of Harmony
desc: Spirit of Harmony is a crafting material used to create enchantments.

name: Celestial Essence
desc: Celestial essence can be used for enchants that will allow you to make an item celestial.
